title: [GAMEPLAY] Thresh - Can q (hook) Farsight Alteration wards
body:
On Thresh when throwing a hook, can hit and pull any ward made by the Farsight Alteration Trinket.
1.) enemy places Farsight Alteration ward
2.) Aim and activate q (hook) towards ward
3.) pull ward
I've tried this 2 times after discovering it, both on basic and championship skins.

replies.body:
Hey Cordel8a11,

Thanks for the report! We're currently looking in this issue. :]
Tried the same thing just now. Nothing happened. If it happens again you should try to get a recording of it.

He should be able to pull into his own wards but not enemies or even his allies (blue trinket thresh, anyone? New Thresh Insec combo?), but being able to block all thresh hooks is *not* how people should fix whatever problems he has
